name: Capture the Meteors
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

use w and a or your left and right arrow keys to move. The goal is to catch as many meteors as you can before your health runs out. If you don't catch a meteor you lose a health point. If you get to a certain score another cube appears which helps you catch more meteors and increases your score, this is how it connects to the theme "stronger together". 

I'm 12 and this is my first game jam, thanks for playing.

download the file for a little bit better experience

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvQoyx3-HLp-O8GeM6daKNw
